details.name: KimiUploadFilesTool
details.details:
❌ PATH FORMAT ERROR
Detected Windows path: \mnt\project\test_files\small_test_0.txt

✅ CORRECT FORMAT:
/mnt/project/EX-AI-MCP-Server/filename.ext

🐳 WHY THIS HAPPENS:
This system runs in Docker. Windows paths are converted to /app/ which doesn't contain your files.

📁 ACCESSIBLE FILES:
Only files under c:\Project\ are available at /mnt/project/ in the container.

🔧 QUICK FIX:
Replace 'c:\Project\' with '/mnt/project/'
